title: suddenly pvp kernel crashes upon loading
body:
I restarted, still crash.
tried the hextech repair tool too, first did a reinstall last patch, nothing.
Then did a repair, and after it uninstalls, it wont even install the game as the kernel crashes again.
Should I do a clean uninstall?

Been playing lol on this new laptop for a few months, and on my PC for a cpl years before.

replies.body: The error you're receiving is usually caused by a security issue blocking the game from loading.  Reinstalling the game won't necessarily solve this if the system can't launch it.  Instead, I recommend going over each step in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
